# Mod B on_actions file (zzz prefix = loads last)
# Load order: 3 (after mod A)
# Adds events to: on_birthday
# Has conflicting: effect on on_birthday (wins!)
# Adds to: on_war_started

on_birthday = {
    # MOD B: Even more birthday events (appended to vanilla + mod A)
    events = {
        mod_b_birthday.0001
    }
    
    # MOD B: Override effect (THIS WINS - last definition)
    effect = {
        add_prestige = 50  # Mod B is generous
        add_gold = 10
        trigger_event = mod_b_birthday.celebration
    }
    
    # MOD B: Also has random_events
    random_events = {
        100 = mod_b_birthday.random_gift
        50 = mod_b_birthday.random_visitor
    }
}

on_war_started = {
    # MOD B: Additional war events
    events = {
        mod_b_war.0001
        mod_b_war.0002
    }
    
    # MOD B: War effect (no vanilla effect, so no conflict)
    effect = {
        add_character_flag = mod_b_war_tracking
    }
}

on_mod_b_unique = {
    # MOD B: Brand new on_action
    trigger = {
        has_trait = brave
    }
    
    events = {
        mod_b_unique.0001
    }
}
